If you liked half life 2, then you'll like this. Sure, the beginning and end drag on a bit and the final hostage mission thing sucks ass, but it's fun. I would recommend getting this on sale or on a bundle, maybe in the Valve's Orange Box. It's not very long, it's between 4-5 hours, so the price isn't really unfair. You should get it if you played half life 2.
the last good single-player valve game. Part 2.

Esse DLC pôde evoluir ainda mais a tecnologia da Engine, complementou extremamente bem o [spoiler] cliffhanger deixado por G-Man [/spoiler] ao final do jogo base, explorou mais puzzles, inimigos em outros contextos e ressignificou sua inteligência artificial a partir da Alyx... [hr] [hr] Jogue!

Feels like 75% cut scene that you can't pass. Very frustrating. Sitting here tapping my fingers most of the time. And when there's "action" its in the dark bumping into that stupid chick constantly. Maybe I'll come back to it someday, but I doubt it.

Half-Life 2: Episode One picks up the plot where Half-Life 2 ended it. The current price tag of around 7 euros is a bit steep for a game that lasted me the whole 2 and a half hours, but you can get it cheaply when it's sale, which is also what i recommend that you do.
Subway Surfer if it had better lore behind it.
its great get it if you never got it yet
Пёс, возвращение на дачу Путина, темно и страшно, светло и не страшно, мухолёт на крыше, паровозик, дача Путина взорвалась, конец.

İlk iki bölümün full gravity gun'a bağlı kalması olayının biraz uzun sürmesi dışında gayet güzel. Ha birde fazla kısa olması var tabi hardda 1 buçuk 2 saatte bitmesi acilen episode 2ye geçme isteği oluşturuyor.
bu oyunu ilk başı nasıl bağlamışlar diye aldım iyikide almışım
this is just half life 2: tunnel edition
Took me 3 hours to beat! Epic!

Just like Half-Life 2, the physics and graphics hold up to this day. All the weapons are just as fun to use as before. In this one, you aren't travelling alone; Alyx Vance becomes your companion for the majority of the game. She helps in fights and provides commentary and sometimes hints, and the experience would not be the same without her. 

This entry doesn't advance the plot too much, but I still recommend your play it to get the full experience.
